text: I'm trying to figure out how to get Sunday Ticket on my Xbox One <https://nflst.directv.com/DTVAPP/nflws/index.jsp>

attachments.title: Discover NFLSUNDAYTICKET.TV MAX & Other Packages | DIRECTV
attachments.text: Description: With <http://NFLSUNDAYTICKET.TV|NFLSUNDAYTICKET.TV> MAX, you can watch football on many devices. Or you can watch football on your PS3, Xbox, iPad or computer, with these new packages
attachments.fallback: DIRECTV: Discover NFLSUNDAYTICKET.TV MAX & Other Packages | DIRECTV

text: I watched a little this weekend, mainly Broncos / Seahawks, but I did catch some of that CLE / DET game. Saw Manziel go to work against the 2nd / 3rd team Det defense.
Preseason is pretty brutal though...  Lots of scrubs & vanilla defense. Did you see the new extra-point rule they're trying out? From the 15? Kinda cool / weird.
